rules_text:
Reach
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
[i]Fusion Art[/i] – {4}{R}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw three cards. If {W}{B} was spent, you may return a creature card with mana value less than or equal to Lora’s power that you discarded this way to the battlefield.
